text: Hagi tamagri vahe'ma rankumapima nemaniza naga'mo'zama, vahe ahefri ke'ma eri'za ege, mago'a kasegeo, trake'ma hantagi'nenaza keagama eme hanageta, zamavumro zmantenke'za Ra Anumzamofo avurera kumira osiho. Hagi ana'ma osnazana Anumzamofo rimpahezamo'a tamagrite'ene tamafuhe'inte'ene egahie. Hagi kema antahitama ana'ma hanazana, nagatmimofo knazana tamagra e'origahaze.
